name: Vaacikaa Tecknocrats Private Limited
overview:
Vaacikaa Tecknocrats Private Limited is a Hybrid Process Outsourcing (HPO) company rendering services in all verticals including affordable mobile apps, designer websites, professional accounting & taxation services and have consolidated their observations through various forms of research and found that there is a lot of scope in terms of web designing to align and improve the key factors of the website service industry. The ever growing needs of back office support services pose an enormous amount of challenges and these challenges were detailed and meticulous research was done for a good one year, the result of which led to the incorporation of our organization. We at Vaacikaa, ensure client satisfaction by concentrating on giving more than what the client desires. Our motive is to mainly understand what the client requires, improve it by giving out a creative layout and encourage the client to give their inputs. Vaacikaa Tecknocrats is the right place where you can find quality work dished out at an affordable price without any delay.

Vaacikaa Tecknocrats Private Limited is a Hybrid Process Outsourcing (HPO) company rendering services in various verticals including Accounting & Taxation, Graphic Designing, Web Designing & Development, Softwar professional accounting & taxation Software Development, Mobile Applications Development, Pharmacovigilance, Medical Tourism, 2-D & 3-D Animation And Web Hosting. Vaacikaa has consolidated their observations through various forms of research and streamlined the ever growing needs of back office support services which pose an enormous amount of challenges and these challenges were detailed and meticulous research was done for a good one year and the result of this led to the incorporation of our organization. We at Vaacikaa ensure client satisfaction by concentrating on giving more than what the client desires. Our motive is to mainly understand what the client requires, improve it by giving out a creative layout and encourage the client to give their inputs. Vaacikaa Tecknocrats is the right place where you can find quality work dished out at an affordable price without any delay.

We are the voice and think tank of our clients and associates and that’s why we named ourselves “Vaacikaa Tecknocrats”. Our tag line “People”, “Process” & “Precision” in a true sense is believed to be the key differentiators between a specialized HP Outsourcing and a traditional Business Process Outsourcing. We foresee ourselves evolving as a macro business enterprise consisting of various micro business units. Services offered by us have been divided into many verticals. Our Support services comprises of Inbound Customer Care through voice, email, chat etc, Outbound Sales, Appointment Fixing, Lead Generation & Knowledge Based Data Processing along with other services such as professional web designing and a complete range of services of efficient accounting & taxation.

We deliver quality service to our clients and are confident of transforming the client’s vision into reality. We expertise in Domain/Vertical specific support solution spread across various continents. Our primary focus is on accounting & Taxation (AU & US) based in Melbourne, Creative Solutions, Medical Tourism, Pharmacovigilance, Staffing Solutions and last but not the least, affordable web designing services. Our ability to provide the latest in technology without compromising on quality has assured us client satisfaction.

Value Proposition

• A one Stop Solution for all Back Office Support Services in Australia • 24/7 online Support Dependency through Skype, phone calls etc. • Flexibility in Scalability of Operations • Quick Turnaround Time • Client Satisfaction Transforming into DELIGHT • Standardized Practices & Efficient Methodologies leading to a Higher Productivity • Leverages the Client’s Time and Resources for Labor Intensive Work • Increase in the Top Line Revenue

Vision

To evolve as a one stop solution for all the outsourcing needs as a Macro Business Enterprise consisting of several Micro Business Units. Mission

Our adept and highly skillful team possess strong talent pools who can build eye-catching websites to cater to the right audience and expertise in diversified verticals; printing of flyers, brochures, efficient accounting & taxation. Core values

Integrity: Integrity is a word with many manifestations; it means keeping one’s word and working without letting down those who believed in us. It is this will to remain honest and being truthful to oneself which helps us deliver our commitments on time to our clients with utmost sincerity.

Quality: We use our resources to make sure we give our clients clear cut and accomplished projects and ideas without compromising on quality and truly believe in the notion that great quality work need not increase the expenses for our clients.

Responsible: We at VAACIKAA believe that the success of any company is not measured solely by the number of years it has been running but is determined by the quality of work the company is able to give out. We understand the needs and demands of any business set up. And therefore, being inefficient is unacceptable. We at VAACIKAA make sure we put in the best at our work which in turn helps decrease the error rate in our projects. We understand the fact that, only we are responsible for our own good fortune and can be an instrument of inspiration.

Creative: Every website’s backbone is the right design. Imagination transforms into creativity. Creativity is, after all the ability to make simple things so different from the rest. The more eye popping the website is, the more it can garner the audience in the right way. We at Vaacikaa understand this power of creativity and we understand that no matter what ideas we give out, there is always a possibility of failing which is why our highly skilled team of professional web designers give out an array of designs for the client to comfortably choose from bearing in mind their requirements and expectations.

Time Bound Delivery of Services: Time is crucial to every business. Doing things at the right time with the right resources brings a lot of dividends, which is why; we understand that planning well ahead is the key to good time management. This planning helps us reach our goals faster in terms of giving the client what he wants. We focus on prioritizing our work which helps meet deadlines at a faster pace.
